sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Footer from './Footer' import BuyProductShimmer from './BuyProductShimmer' import { useSearchParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { PROD_API } from './constants' const BuyProduct = () => { const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true) const[product,setProduct]=useState([]) const [searchParam]=useSearchParams() useEffect(()=>{ buyProducts() },[]) const buyProducts=async()=>{ const data=await fetch(`https://dummyjson.com/products/${searchParam.get("v")}`) const json=await data.json() setProduct(json) setIsLoading(false) }
return ( <>
{isLoading ? : <>
{product.title}
{product.description}
₹{((product.price) * 81).toLocaleString()}.00 ₹{(((product.price)*81)/(1-product.discountPercentage/100)).toFixed(2).toLocaleString()}
}
) } export default BuyProduct
